body:
Hi Theodore, I notice that you are trying to conduct energy simulation based on daylight calculation in Honeybee. Actually, I am now trying to do the same thing, but I encountered some difficulties in linking the lighting schedule to the energy simulation in a proper way. My problems are listed here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/read-ep-res...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/read-ep-result-results-are-missing-in-the-new-version?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1277590&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) Could you please share some of your experience with me? Thank you in advance!
Best, Ding
